task.title: Stopping a server
task.shortdesc: You can stop the server from the Servers view.

step.cmd: In the Servers view ( Window > Show View > Other > Server > Servers > OK), select the server that you want to stop.

image.alt: This is an image of the Stop icon.
This is an image of the Stop icon.

info.ph: In the Servers view, the status of the server changes to Stopped.

cmd.ph: If for some reason the server fails to stop, you can terminate the process as follows:

substep.cmd: In the Process view, select the server process that you want to stop.

image.alt: This is an image of the Terminate icon.
This is an image of the Terminate icon

result.note: When terminating a server, the server process will end and the server will not go through the normal routine of stopping, for example calling the destroy() method on a servlet.
